name: DOLDRUM
description:
A surreal action rhythm game for the developed for the HTC Vive.

Play on a xylophone to hit the notes. Dodge boss attacks and fire back. Survive until the end!

To play this game with an HTC Vive device:

  • Trigger button to grab sticks
  • Hit xylophone faces by physically hitting them with controllers
  • Menu button above the touchpad to pause

To play this game without an HTC Vive device:

  • V key to toggle the screen to keyboard mode
  • [ and ] keys to grab sticks
  • Number keys to hit xylophone faces
  • P to pause game

DOLDRUM was made as a Major Qualifying Project at Worcester Polytechnic Institute by the following:

  • David Allen
  • Kent Fong
  • Laurie Mazza
  • Matt Szpunar
  • Henry Wheeler-Mackta 
  • Kelly Zhang
